channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Erika Kirk says she forgives the man accused of killing her husband
item.description: Speaking to tens of thousands of people at the memorial, Kirk said she had found comfort in prayer and also in the way people had responded to her husband's death.
item.content:encoded:
Speaking to tens of thousands of people at the memorial, Kirk said she had found comfort in prayer and also in the way people had responded to her husband's death.

(Image credit: Patrick T. Fallon)
item.dc:creator: Fatma Tanis

item.title: German and Swedish jets intercept Russian military plane over Baltic Sea
item.description: This was the latest event after a series of incursions by Russian military aircraft into NATO airspace in September, leading to heightened tensions between NATO and Russia.
item.content:encoded:
This was the latest event after a series of incursions by Russian military aircraft into NATO airspace in September, leading to heightened tensions between NATO and Russia.

(Image credit: Julien De Rosa)
item.dc:creator: Fatma Tanis

item.title: Photos: Tens of thousands of supporters attend memorial for Charlie Kirk in Arizona
item.description: Crowds filled a stadium in Arizona to remember the right-wing activist Charlie Kirk.
item.content:encoded:
Crowds filled a stadium in Arizona to remember the right-wing activist Charlie Kirk.

(Image credit: Joe Raedle)
item.dc:creator: Ben de la Cruz

item.title: A'ja Wilson snags a record fourth WNBA MVP
item.description: Wilson, a 6-foot-4 center for the Las Vegas Aces, has dominated this year. In her eighth season, she finished in the top five in points, rebounds, blocks and steals.
item.content:encoded:
Wilson, a 6-foot-4 center for the Las Vegas Aces, has dominated this year. In her eighth season, she finished in the top five in points, rebounds, blocks and steals.

(Image credit: Harry How)
item.dc:creator: Russell Lewis

item.title: Trump nominates White House aide to be top US prosecutor for office probing Letitia James
item.description: President Donald Trump said Saturday that he would be nominating senior White House aide Lindsey Halligan to serve as the top federal prosecutor for the Virginia office that was thrown into turmoil when its U.S. attorney was pushed out Friday.
item.content:encoded:
President Donald Trump said Saturday that he would be nominating senior White House aide Lindsey Halligan to serve as the top federal prosecutor for the Virginia office that was thrown into turmoil when its U.S. attorney was pushed out Friday.

(Image credit: Jacquelyn Martin)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: U.K., Canada and Australia recognize a Palestinian state, despite U.S. opposition
item.description: The designation from U.S. allies follows U.K. Prime Minister Keir Starmer's meeting with President Trump last week.
item.content:encoded:
The designation from U.S. allies follows U.K. Prime Minister Keir Starmer's meeting with President Trump last week.

(Image credit: Suzanne Plunkett)
item.dc:creator: Chandelis Duster

item.title: Trump calls Charlie Kirk 'martyr now for American freedom' at memorial service
item.description: At a service focused on Kirk's conservative Christian faith, President Trump described the late 31-year-old as the "greatest evangelist for American liberty" as Kirk's widow forgave the alleged gunman.
item.content:encoded:
At a service focused on Kirk's conservative Christian faith, President Trump described the late 31-year-old as the "greatest evangelist for American liberty" as Kirk's widow forgave the alleged gunman.

(Image credit: Win McNamee)
item.dc:creator: Elena Moore

item.title: Man is arrested and charged in New Hampshire country club shooting
item.description: A gunman opened fire in a New Hampshire country club on Saturday, killing one person and wounding several others, authorities said.
item.content:encoded:
A gunman opened fire in a New Hampshire country club on Saturday, killing one person and wounding several others, authorities said.

(Image credit: Michael Casey)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Tropical Storm Gabrielle expected to become 2nd Atlantic hurricane of the season
item.description: Gabrielle is forecast to pass east of Bermuda, the U.S. mainland, and could rise to the strength of a Category 2 hurricane.
item.content:encoded:
Gabrielle is forecast to pass east of Bermuda, the U.S. mainland, and could rise to the strength of a Category 2 hurricane.

(Image credit: National Hurricane Center)
item.dc:creator: Ava Pukatch

item.title: Man arrested after drive-by shooting at ABC TV station in Sacramento
item.description: At least three bullets were fired into the station, according to the Sacramento Police Department. Authorities are investigating a possible motive.
item.content:encoded:
At least three bullets were fired into the station, according to the Sacramento Police Department. Authorities are investigating a possible motive.

(Image credit: Screenshot)
item.dc:creator: Chandelis Duster
